Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.horsego.service.UserService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service

    public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Service
    Class for working with user services. Implements the interface Service To get an instance of this class call the method ServiceFactory.getUserService() on an object of the ServiceFactory class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mikita Masukhranau
    See Also:
    Service, ServiceFactory
